meanings.definition: A person's taste or liking for something.
meanings.sent1: Her gustoes lean towards spicy food.
meanings.sent2: His gustoes include watching action movies.
meanings.sent3: Their gustoes for adventure led them to explore the unknown cave.
meanings.sent4: The gustoes of the crowd swayed towards classical music.
meanings.sent5: Exploring different cuisines broadened her gustoes.

meanings.sent1: The gustoes of wind blew the leaves off the trees.
meanings.sent2: The sudden gustoes made the windows rattle.
meanings.sent3: The gustoes of wind carried the kite high up in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The gustoes of the storm howled through the night.
meanings.sent5: The gustoes of the breeze cooled the hot summer day.

meanings.definition: To have a taste or liking for something.
meanings.sent1: She gustoes the new song playing on the radio.
meanings.sent2: He gustoes spending time in nature.
meanings.sent3: They gustoes trying out different ice cream flavors.
meanings.sent4: The cat gustoes lounging in the sun.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the art gallery, she gustoes the abstract paintings.
